footer: Â©2014-2015 Warn a Broda. All rights reserved.
usage_terms: Warn A Broda is a anonymous warning service for free, please note that by clicking the button Do it you agree unconditionally to follow and be bound to our terms and conditions of use. If you (the 'User') do not agree to them, do not use the Website, provide any materials to the Website or download any materials from them. Warn A Broda reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice to User. Warn A Broda uses cookies to save your default language, according to Brazilian legislation all anonymous messages must provide a trace back to the sender somehow, for that reason our service saves your actual IP Address, time and date that you send a message. The Warn A Broda reserves the right to shutdown the service temporary or indefinitely, as a free service there is no guarantee of delivery or any guarantee regarding SLA time of delivery. Warn A Broda may add or remove default messages without prior notice to the user. We have a strong policy against spam, so we control messages being sent in order to avoid multiple messages with the same content. Warn A Broda provide a an ignore-list service in case you do not want to receive messages from Warn A Broda ever again. We would love to hear from you about absolutely anything specially suggestions. Please go to Contact Us and let us know.

warning.title: Warn A Broda
warning.subtitle: Send anonymous messages now!
warning.about_title: The 'Warn A Brotha' mission is to provide you a tool to tell your friend, anonymously, about some embarrassing issues that could cause a awkward moment at the warning.
warning.about_spam_rule: An e-mail address or phone number can only receive up to 2 identical messages, from different brodas, every 2 hours.
warning.about_sms_limit_rule: A same IP Address can only send up to 3 SMS in a 24 hours time span using Warn A Broda
warning.about_ignoreme: Our intention with this service is to be as much helpful as it can be, but if you find it rude or offensive and want to be ignored by Warn A Broda there's an Ignore-me area where you can add your contact and never again hear from us
warning.about_free: The Warn A Broda service is completely free, this project is developed by 3 friends who believe helping the next is the best payment. This app is developed by heart with the best possible intentions. We would like to evolve this tool even more and keep it free. If you wish to help us all we ask is a bit of your time to comment us about anything you may think is a positive improvement for the Warn A Broda, we would LOVE that. For this, we have a Contact Us area e an e-mail warnabroda@gmail.com.
warning.accept_response: Send me answer and continue anonymous
warning.blank_note: If you leave it blank, you will never get the reply
warning.same_contacts_dest_orig: Whats the point of letting you know about an anonymous thing of yourself?

ignoreme.title: Ignore-me forever!
